item.title: Spotify API: Making my first call
item.description: I wanted to enrich the data for a little music application I’m working on and realised it would be a perfect opportunity to try out the Spotify API. I want to extract data about individual tracks (via the Tracks API), but before we do that we’ll need to create an app and have it approved for access to the Spotify API.
